dmca.title: Pearlparadise Notifies Google of Infringing Material (#2)
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please find our DMCA complaint below:

Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe has been infringed.
"The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.barzey.com/archives/2003/06/pearl_paradise.html
This page was removed by Google approximately one year prior as it was determined to be in violation of our copyright. It has reappeared on the same Site in the archives. Please note that even our copyright indication is included in the post.
Identify the material that you claim is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above.

Google Search Terms:
Pearl Paradise - in the 3rd position. 
Pearlparadise
